scripts.setup: npm run clean_install && npm run data:reset
scripts.clean_install: npm ci && lerna clean && npm run bootstrap
scripts.bootstrap: lerna exec npm ci && lerna run build
scripts.bootstrap:old: lerna exec npm ci && npm run build && lerna bootstrap --hoist=grpc --force-local --ci && lerna run build
scripts.build: npm run link && lerna run build
scripts.data:reset: npm run data:clean && npm run configure && npm run data:setup
scripts.test:suite: npm run start && lerna run test --scope @dashevo/platform-test-suite ; npm run stop
scripts.build_and_run_test_suite: npm run build && npm run configure && npm run test
